actions.description: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies
actions.name: Shape-Shift

specialTraits.description: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object
specialTraits.name: False Appearance (Object Form only)
